title: DryGuy Simple Dry Boot and Glove Dryer
features: Convection-based boot and glove drying system heats to approximately 105 degrees Fahrenheit
Dries two garments (1 pair) in 6-8 hours
Completely silent, no moving parts; fluted tube design improves circulation
Will not damage fragile materials in footwear or other garments
description: The DryGuy Simple Dry Boot and Glove Dryer is a safe, simple, overnight way to dry footwear and gloves. Using thermal convection, naturally rising warm air, the DryGuy Simple Dry removes dampness, perspiration, and odor from all types of shoes or boots, as well as mittens and gloves. Warm air gradually rises to dry one pair of rain soaked shoes, hard to dry boots or wet gloves, harmlessly, in just 6 to 8 hours. Using minimal watts, the DryGuy Simple Dry Boot and Glove Dryer is a cost-effective economically friendly tool for daily use to dry or warm footwear. Convection-based boot and glove drying system heats to approximately 105 degrees Fahrenheit.
